arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta reveals why he 'looks up to' Atletico Madrid manager Diego Simeone on the eve of Arsenal's Champions League clash
arts.sum: Simeone is one of the longest-serving managers in Europe's top tiers, having overseen a nearly 14-year tenure with LaLiga giants - eight years longer than Arteta's time at the Emirates.

arts.ttl: Arsenal Predicted Lineup vs. Atletico Madrid: Martinelli Returns for Continental Clash
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta is expected to make subtle changes from the team that started at Craven Cottage.

arts.sum: Arsenal have yet to concede in this season's Champions League and Mikel Arteta's side are due to welcome Atletico Madrid to North London in their third league phase game

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta heaps praise on Diego Simeone ahead of Arsenal vs Atletico Madrid
Arsenal vs Atletico Madrid: UEFA Champions League Preview, Gameweek 3, 2025
arts.sum: The Champions League is back and for Arsenal, they welcome Spanish giants Atletico Madrid to the Emirates Stadium as they look to build on their perfect start to this season‚Äôs European campaign after securing 2-0 victories over both Athletic Club and Olympiacos. Like Arsenal, Madrid secured a narrow 1-0 victory on the weekend with substitute Thiago Almada scoring the winner with twenty minutes to play against Osasuna.
